import React from "react"; import "./Detail.css"; import { faBed, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/Navbar"; import Email from "../../components/email/Email"; import Footer from "../../components/footer/Footer"; import detailData from "../../data/detail.json"; const Detail = () => { return (
{detailData.map((props, index) => (

{props.name}

{props.address}

Try scrolling the rest of the page to see this option in action.

))}
); }; export default Detail;
